column2: Credit Suisse settles Freeport-McMoRan litigation for $16.25 mln March 16 Credit Suisse Group Inc will pay $10 million in cash and provide $6.25 million worth of advisory work to Freeport-McMoRan Inc to settle allegations it contributed to the natural resources company having overpaid significantly for two oil and gas companies.
